item.description:
As you know summer is Carnival season so it seems timely for us to get in the spirit by heading to Johnny D's once again, to enjoy the lively powerful sound of Marcus Santos and Bloco AfroBrazil.

Another reason for the party is to celebrate, fellow Meetup member Tomn aka Tony Maiella CD release of Brazilian inspired music

Local band Ray Hendricks Revival is also performing original music, which sounds real cool

If you want to get in the mood, try a refreshing Guarana, Caipirinha, Caju Amigo....well known Brazilian beverages.


Here's yet another chance for you to experience the baddest, loudest, funnest indoor carnival around. Yes, I am a GIGANTIC fan which is apparent because each time this group parties, I place it on the Portuguese and Onyxbirds Meetup calendars. Since dinner is an option, I've also invited the Meetup dining group, Breakfast Brunch Lunch & Dinner. Let's pack the place again, because the more the merrier and also your presence will convince Johnny D's to keep the Bloco AfroBrazil party on their schedule.

Bloco AfroBrazil is a 12-piece percussion ensemble that always puts on a spectacular show combining traditional Brazilian grooves like Samba and Ax√© with Funk, Rock, Jazz and even Hip Hop; add to this, (who will get you in rhythm)and you got a recipe for FUN, Brazilian style!! Bring your dance shoes or socks and leave your worries at the door!!


Bring your friends....I guarantee a funtastic time, that is if you like your music strong and your party loud.

You must be at least 21 but you don't have to drink, just enjoy each others company and an AMAZING! show.

Once the drumming, singing and dancing start, group conversation is difficult. Let's just enjoy the party!


$10 cash cover charge at the door
If you want to be included in the 8:30 PM dinner reservation you must also order at least $10 (this is in addition to $10 cover) in food and/or drink....otherwise you're welcome to enjoy the show from the bar or dance floor.



If you come for just the music, stop by the dinner table to say hello and so you can meet folks.


Johnny D's Dinner Menu



PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
